definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: Most of the audience left before a speaker finishing his speech in a meeting room.
sentences.chinese: 一位演讲者还未讲完，大多数听众就已离开大会议室。

sentences.english: A large number of my former students showed up, a full room of former students.
sentences.chinese: 结果我以前的那些学生把会议室给撑了个满满当当。

sentences.english: It heads back to the conference room.
sentences.chinese: 接着它转头走回了会议室。

sentences.english: On entering the meeting room, I caught sight of him.
sentences.chinese: 刚一进会议室，我就看见他了。

sentences.english: Above the main server room is a suspended glass corridor and a round see-through meeting room.
sentences.chinese: 主程序室上面是一个悬空的全玻璃透明会议室。

sentences.english: The chairman ranged his eyes over the crowded conference room and began his speech.
sentences.chinese: 主席向坐满人的会议室扫视了一下，然后开始讲话。

sentences.english: We'll sign the contract tomorrow morning, at 8, in the meeting-room, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我们明天上午八点在会议室签合同，好吗？

sentences.english: The meeting room is some times larger than our classroom.
sentences.chinese: 那个会议室比我们的教室大几倍。

sentences.english: Our boardroom is up on the twenty-third floor.
sentences.chinese: 我们会议室在最高层，二十三层。

sentences.english: The conference rooms have a presentation screen for displaying shared documents.
sentences.chinese: 会议室有一个用来显示共享文档的展示屏。

sentences.english: The meeting-room is three times bigger than our office.
sentences.chinese: 会议室比我们的办公室大三倍。

sentences.english: There being no further discussion, the chairman stood up and left the meeting-room.
sentences.chinese: 没有可讨论的了，主席站了起来，离开了会议室。

sentences.english: The conference room resounded with waves of warm applauses and cheers.
sentences.chinese: 会议室爆发出阵阵热烈的掌声和欢乐的笑声。

sentences.english: Perfect Bethlehem PA location for small meetings, conference calls & interviews in PA.
sentences.chinese: 会议室非常适合有长住需求的小型团体。

sentences.english: Please come here. I show you to the conference room.
sentences.chinese: 请往这边走，我带你们到会议室。

sentences.english: He took his seat in an unobserved corner of the assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 他在会议室一个不为人注意的犄角坐下来。

definition: meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
